short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a rating to Convus for the page you're viewing in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convus.org lets you rate websites that you read so you can track, share and find articles that are useful, informative and high quality.

This browser extension makes the process of submitting ratings easy.

Use control + shift + R to open the ratings dialog.
